item.title: VersionControl
item.description: Version Control The Hive source code resides in Apache’s [Hive GitHub]({{ site.repository }}) Anonymous clone via http - https://github.com/apache/hive.git Authenticated clone via ssh - git@github.com:apache/hive.git Instructions: Apache committer git instructions
